name: The Princess in the Mirror
storyline:
One day you're a normal secretary, and the next you're dragged into an unfamiliar world!
We have awaited your coming, Your Highness.
You inherit an old hand-mirror from your grandma,
and it sucks you into a completely different world.
summary: From Voltage's famous interactive romance series comes the glitzy, fairy tale world of The Princess in the Mirror!
